description: 19 year-old Donavin Fitch dropped by the studio while we were working and was so attracted to 20 year-old Deejay Carey that he convinced Deejay to do an action scene with him later that night. We filmed it in the freight elevator, and it turned out really hot! The two young men trade oral favors, one sucking the other... Deejay briefly fucks Donavin... before it's back to sucking. Donavin shoots his creamy load on Deejay's face, and he happily laps it up, before laying down to stroke himself to a gushing climax.
title: CitiBoyz 25: Studio Sessions, Scene #06
